text: ane musa (a.Sa.)E sittera vyakti'one potani koma manthi amara nakki karela samaya mate pasanda karya, to jyare te loko para dharatikampa avi pahoncyo, to musa (a.Sa.) Kaheva lagya ke he mara palanahara! Jo tari iccha hota to a pahela ja te'one ane mane nasta kari didha hota, sum amara manthi thodaka murkha lokona karane amane pana nasta kari da'isa? A kis'so phakata tara taraphathi kasoti che, avi kasoti dvara jene tum icche tene pathabhrasta kari de, ane jene icche satya marga para adaga rakhe, tum ja amaro vyavasthapaka che. Basa! Amara para maphi ane daya kara, ane tum dareka mapha karanara'o karata vadhare mapha karanara che
